title: Array to CSV
description: In this lab, we will explore how to use JavaScript to convert a 2D array to a comma-separated values (CSV) string. The lab will guide you through the process of using Array.prototype.map() and Array.prototype.join() to create a CSV string from a 2D array. By the end of the lab, you will have a solid understanding of how to convert arrays into CSV strings using JavaScript.

meta.title: Convert 2D Array to CSV with JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to use JavaScript to convert a 2D array into a comma-separated values (CSV) string.
meta.keywords: data processing, javascript, csv, javascript practice, javascript practice online, javascript lab, javascript tutor, array, conversion

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
